permissions: Admins can create inspections. Non-admins can create inspections if they are the inspection creator on a persisted record, a member of the broker tied to the inspection, a member of the customer tied to the inspection with permission to view the job production plan, a manager member of the job production plan developer, a job production plan inspector, or the driver on the tender job schedule shift when the job production plan expects an inspection.
validation_notes: --material-transaction is required. Status accepts: open, closed, and is required by the model. Strategy accepts: delivery_site_personnel; default is delivery_site_personnel when omitted. Material transaction inspections are unique per material transaction (material_transaction_id must be unique). Delivery site must be a JobSite or MaterialSite and must match the trip destination; delivery site is auto-set from the trip destination.
